channel.title: gtd on My geek blog
channel.description: Recent content in gtd on My geek blog

item.title: Getting lost and found
item.description: It’s really frustrating to be following your own footsteps every time, as you may notice I love exploring, trying new things, tools, commands, etc… I would say that I’m not the only one that “learned” something new on the terminal after looking for some solutions online and reading some fucking manuals and once configured properly then you forget it almost instantly.
